name: Recruit Pack
detailed_description:
Play a signifcant role in this massively multiplayer war


downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At anytime, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

This DLC unlocks access to the following vehicles and weapons of Tier 0 (pre-1940):

Submachine guns:
  • BRITISH M1928 Thompson SMG (Reserve)
  • BRITISH Sten Mk II SMG (Reserve)
  • AMERICAN M1A1 Thompson SMG (Reserve)
  • AMERICAN M3A1 Grease Gun SMG (Reserve)
  • FRENCH Mas38 SMG (Reserve)
  • ITALIAN Beretta SMG (Reserve)
  • GERMAN MP40 SMG (Reserve)
Reserve Submachine Guns are equipped with 4 magazines of ammo, a grenade, and a knife.

Trucks:
  • Opel Blitz (German Truck)
  • Laffly S-20 (French Truck)
  • Bedford OYD (US & British Truck)
Trucks are capable of deploying a fortified mobile spawn point, transporting infantry, re-supplying any ground unit, and towing small anti-tank and anti-aircraft guns.
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=lI9ebaAyeqM

Fairmiles:
  • Fairmile B Patrol Ship (Royal Navy, French Navy, Kriegsmarine)
The Fairmile B patrol ship fits within the rivers across the game map. You can load infantry and transport them. It has a 2 Pounder anti-tank gun on the bow (front). It also has several machine guns. It also has a single and double barrel anti-aircraft gun that fires a devastating high-explosive round capable of shooting aircraft down, blowing up trucks and eliminating enemy personnel (infantry).

Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

The units included in this Recruit pack DLC are also available with the 30-days STARTER pack.

short_description: Become a "Recruit" and get access to Reserve Submachine Guns, trucks to move troops and supply and get an armed patrol boat to maneuver marines and participate in naval warfare. Truck can deploy fortified mobile spawn point.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
